title: Design Matters From the Archive: Chip Kidd
description: Debbie talks to book designer Chip Kidd about why his TED talk turned into the most terrifying 19 minutes of his life, and about his book of graphic design for children.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to book designer Chip Kidd about why his TED talk turned into the most terrifying 19 minutes of his life, and about his book of graphic design for children.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
